label: 権大僧都
対訳語: Provisional Senior Assistant High Priest of Buddhism
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: A Buddhist official, being one of the Buddhist Hierarchy (Sōgō), who holds one of the provisional posts (gon-kan). Those Buddhist priests who held this post and are mentioned in this book are as follows, being listed in the order of their appearance in the text: Shinsei, Ekishin, Chōsan, Kanshun, Ukei, and Kanshin. [僧綱、権官、真済(also read Shinzei)、益信、長算、桓舜、有慶、寛信]
